official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1, 4-Benzenedisulfonic acid,2,2,'-Y(1-methyl-1,2-ethanediyl) bisYimino(6-fluoro-1,3,5-triazine-4,2-diyl)imino(1-hydroxy-3 sulfo-6,2-napthalenediyl)azo??bisY5-methoxy-sodium salt.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1, 4-Benzenedisulfonic acid,2,2,'-Y(1-methyl-1,2-ethanediyl) bisYimino(6-fluoro-1,3,5-triazine-4,2-diyl)imino(1-hydroxy-3 sulfo-6,2-napthalenediyl)azo??bisY5-methoxy-sodium salt.
